CustomField.formula: CASE( License_Currency__c, "DKK", BLANKVALUE(Monthly_License_Cost__c, 0), "SEK", BLANKVALUE(Monthly_License_Cost__c * SEK_to_DKK__c, 0), "USD", BLANKVALUE(Monthly_License_Cost__c * USD_to_DKK__c, 0), "GBP", BLANKVALUE(Monthly_License_Cost__c * GBP_to_DKK__c, 0), "EUR", BLANKVALUE(Monthly_License_Cost__c * EUR_to_DKK__c, 0), 0 )
CustomField.label: Monthly Cost Per License in DKK
